message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $95. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $95 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $105.  This is a fair price that considers both our needs.  Let's make this happen!
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and I'm still not able to meet at $105. I would like to propose $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
